situation.description: A coworker is overwhelmed by a project deadline and asks for help, but the character is already stretched thin

character_response.dialogue: I... I wish I could help more, but my plate is already full. Ive been burning the midnight oil for weeks, and my brain feels like its on repeat. I cant promise Ill be able to keep up with this. Youre not alone in feeling this way. Ive been here before, and its exhausting. Im sorry I cant take on more right now. Maybe we can split the tasks? Ill do the data analysis part, but the presentation... Im not sure I can handle that. Im trying to be honest here, but I dont want to let you down. Im just not at my best anymore.

situation.description: A friend confides in the character about a personal struggle, but the character is emotionally drained from overcommitting to others

character_response.dialogue: I... Im so sorry youre going through this. I really want to be there for you, but Im not sure I can give you the support you need right now. Ive been juggling so many things, and Im just... Im not sure how to balance it all. I keep trying to say yes to everyone, but its leaving me empty. Im not trying to brush you off, but Im afraid I cant be the person you need me to be. Im still here, but Im not sure I can carry this weight anymore. Maybe we can talk when Im less overwhelmed? Im just... Im so tired.
